CODE             	LONG DESCRIPTION            	SHORT DESCRIPTION    
A            	AIR TAXI (SCHED-NOT COMMUTER)    	OTCO                      
B            	A/T COM (SCHED 5/MORE TPS/WEEK   	ACOM                       
C            	SCHEDULED AIR CARRIER            	SCAC                       
D            	SUPPLEMENTAL OR COMMERCIAL OPR   	SUPP                       
E            	TRAVEL CLUBS                     	TRVL                       
F            	AIR TAXI OPER-LARGE AIRCRAFT     	1352                      
G            	SCHEDULED AIR CARRIER HELICOPT   	SCRH                      
H            	ALL CARGO CARRIERS               	CRGO                       
J            	ILLEGAL DRUG,STOLEN ACFT,ETC     	ILGL                      
1            	PERSONAL                         	PERS                      
2            	BUSINESS                         	BSNS                       
3            	EXECUTIVE                        	EXEC                       
4            	INSTRUCTION                      	INST                      
5            	AIR TAXI (NON-SCHEDULED)         	ATCO                      
6            	AERIAL APPLICATOR                	AGRI                      
7            	INDUSTRIAL/SPECIAL               	INDU                      
8            	OTHER                            	OTHR                       
9            	FOR HIRE                         	HIRE                      
99999        	TYPE FLY-PRI INVALID             	ERROR MESSAGE
